title: How Sega Challenged the Gaming World
description:
Shukri reviews the Netflix series, High Score, and discusses the rise of Sega. How did Sega challenge Nintendo? How are Sonic and Madden Football related? This podcast will explain the connections.

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
